Contact us

The best way to get in touch with our community is to stop by one of our meetups. For a comprehensive list of all events in Hong Kong, have a look at the calendar.

You can also reach us by email at: info@bitcoin.org.hk

Stay in Touch

Join our Meetup Group to be alerted immediately about new events!

Join our Telegram Channel @BitcoinHK for announcements, events and opportunities, and join @Bitcoinorghk for the latest news.

Follow us on Twitter!

Follow us on Facebook!

Follow us on Instagram!

Subscribe to our Calendar, which lists both our events and all other Bitcoin/Ethereum/Blockchain events around Hong Kong. Click here for the ICAl/ICS file
